articles.title: Multibaggers: These 17 stocks have given high returns in short and long term - Moneycontrol
articles.description: A Moneycontrol analysis of BSE 500 stocks showed only 17 stocks have given exceptional returns in last 1-year, 3-year and 5-year periods. SRF, Tata Elxsi and Adani Power figure on the list.

articles.description: Tata Motors recently launched the Nexon EV Prime, the third version of its best-selling electric SUV brand. The Nexon EV helps Tata's electric cars to contribute seven per cent to its overall sales.

articles.description: India's annual inflation rate in June remained painfully above the 7% mark and beyond the central bank's tolerance band for the sixth month in a row, raising the prospects for more rate hikes by the central bank next month.
